metadata.Title: CVE-2022-48434 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.Description: libavcodec/pthread_frame.c in FFmpeg before 5.1.2, as used in VLC and otherproducts, leaves stale hwaccel state in worker threads, which allowsattackers to trigger a use-after-free and execute arbitrary code in somecircumstances (e.g., hardware re-initialization upon a mid-video SPS changewhen Direct3D11 is used).

criterions.comment: ffmpeg package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
